alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 05 at 3:23AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Possible Slick Surfaces This Morning Across Vermont and Northern New York... Scattered light snow and snow showers last evening and overnight along with falling temperatures below freezing have created areas of slick surfaces, especially untreated surfaces, across Vermont and northern New York. These slick surfaces include roads as well as driveways and walkways. If traveling by vehicle or by foot this morning, please use caution. Remember to slow down and avoid sudden turns or stops. Please allow extra distance between you and the vehicle in front of you. Conditions should gradually improve by mid-morning.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex
